title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Science Context-Based English Writing Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Capable of structuring scientific experiment observations into three or more coherent sentences in English
Able to compose a five-sentence essay on given scientific cases (experimental procedures, natural phenomena) using logical connectors
Can correct over 80% of grammatical errors in scientific essays through a peer feedback system
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
